card1.title: Heal. Balance. Evolve.
card1.desc: Centering you and your family’s health, so you can get well and stay well.

testimonial.desc1: Integrating centuries-old healing traditions with science and medical testing.
testimonial.desc2: IMI’s practitioners work with awareness that your health is connected to seven key factors. Mind, body, emotions, spirit, energy, community and environment.
testimonial.desc3: We’re led by science and nature. Find the root cause of your concern for sustained healing.
